properties.label: Specify the collection name in firestore DB
properties.name: collectionName

properties.label: Specify the document name to read the checkpoint details
properties.name: documentName

properties.label: Dataset name where incremental pull table exists
properties.name: incrPullTableDataset

properties.label: Table name that needs incremental pull
properties.name: incrPullTableName

properties.label: Specify the checkpoint column from incremental pull table
properties.name: checkpointColumn
